Data Integration and Management: Used data lakes and data warehouses
Data Visualization and Reporting: Used Qlik, Power BI, Looker, Tableau for visualizations
Cloud Migration and Infrastructure: Migrated to cloud platforms (Azure, Google Cloud, AWS)
Used managed services and serverless architecture
Collaboration and Communication: Adopted Microsoft Teams, Slack, Google Workspace
Security and Compliance: Used security tools like Azure Security Center, Google Cloud IAM
Training and Change Management: Developed internal champions and super users
Automation and Optimization: Automated workflows with tools like Power Automate
